text: Byrsophyllum tetrandrum is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to Kerala and Tamil Nadu in India. Its habitat has been damaged from exposure to fires, animal grazing, commercial agriculture and deforestation. ==References== tetrandrum Category:Flora of Kerala Category:Flora of Tamil Nadu Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Byrsophyllum tetrandrum
